welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Elsen, known for its beautiful architecture and bustling markets. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in the city's rich culture and history. We hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Guetersloh Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
